title: Belichick's experience matters; Pats' core shines; Goff's limitations exposed
itunes:title: Belichick's experience matters; Pats' core shines; Goff's limitations exposed
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff looks at why Belichick's experience was the difference against the Rams, how the Patriots core players are still elite, how Jared Goff's limitations were massively exposed, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
